summary: Utility module that parses various JavaScript/Node.js configuration files (e.g., package.json, Babel, Rollup, Snowpack, tsconfig, Vite, Webpack) and extracts module alias information, handling JSON with comments and export patterns to aid reachability analysis.
business_intent: Enable accurate static analysis of Node.js projects by resolving module alias mappings, improving software composition analysis and security scanning of dependencies.
